text: James Reid (born December 15, 1990) is a Canadian former professional ice hockey Goaltender. He last played for the Evansville IceMen of the ECHL. After a junior career in the Western Hockey League, Reid was signed to a contract to make his professional debut with the Lake Erie Monsters of the American Hockey League (AHL) in the 2011–12 season.
